	<div class="PCD_person_info">

                    <div class="WB_text">
                        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6112953951" usercard="id=6112953951">守法公民law</a>：安徽省阜阳监狱殴打虐待新犯人17天死亡，被害人在阜阳监狱受到多次殴打捆绑虐待等违法行为，可执法人员不作为，监狱拒绝出示完整监控录像等资料，阜检说没有发现殴打，省检五部安主任说这个叫肢体接触跟死亡没有关系，鉴定说时间长了做不了。相关人员一手办案不顾事实法规，违规违纪保护违法人员！                    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%8D%87%E8%87%B33858%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利确诊病例升至3858例#</a>】当地时间3月5日18时，意大利例行疫情新闻发布会公布，该国目前累计新冠肺炎确诊病例达3858例。目前意大利20个大区已全部出现新冠肺炎确诊病例。（总台记者 邓宗宇） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BB%E6%92%AD%E8%AF%B4%E8%81%94%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#主播说联播#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B7%B4%E9%93%81%E7%9C%9F%E9%93%81%23&amp;from=default">#巴铁真铁#</a>】中国疫情发生后，巴基斯坦第一时间送来30万只医用口罩和其它防护装备，这是他们尽全力从全国所有公立医院调集来的库存。“巴铁”，真铁！最近一些国家疫情形势有变化，我们也在自己力所能及的情况下反过来向他们援助了医用物资，分享防控经验。守望相助才能共克时艰！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/9f/2018new_jiayou_org.png" title="[加油]" alt="[加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"> ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ixg55evxV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479266433457859:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479266433457859&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E4%B8%BA%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E5%81%9C%E4%B8%8B%E6%AC%A3%E8%B5%8F%E6%97%A5%E8%90%BD%23&amp;from=default">#医生为病人停下欣赏日落#</a>【这位老人曾经心情低落，如今常常唱歌】医疗队队员介绍，老人曾心情低落，还没有换洗衣服，家人住得很远。医疗队担负起他的生活物资供应，包括糕点、水果，连内衣都是男队员捐的。在医疗队细心诊疗照料下，老人如今开始康复，常常唱歌。转起祝福！                                            </div>

                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4479216797771991" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="央视新闻" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@央视新闻</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E4%B8%BA%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E5%81%9C%E4%B8%8B%E6%AC%A3%E8%B5%8F%E6%97%A5%E8%90%BD%23&amp;from=default">#医生为病人停下欣赏日落#</a>【落日余晖下的这个瞬间，刻骨铭心<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">转发！存下！】武大人民医院东院，上海复旦大学附属中山医院援鄂医疗队队员刘凯医生在护送病人做CT途中，停下来，让已经住院近一个月的87岁老先生欣赏了一次久违的日落……落日余晖下的两个身影，好暖<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">（总台央视记者王殿甲） ​​​​                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">

                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4479254911481067&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2656274875%26mid%3D4479254911481067&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IxfMv6dib&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fcctvxinwen&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609493810&amp;ssig=9MOCF94vxW" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479254911481067" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IxfMv6dib?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-05 23:10" date="1583421054000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479254911481067:fromprofile"> 2020-3-5 23:10</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%98%E8%82%83%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E11%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#甘肃新增11例境外输入新冠肺炎病例#</a>】3月4日20时至3月5日20时，甘肃本地无新增病例。截止3月5日20时，甘肃本地累计报告新型冠状病毒肺炎确诊病例91例，累计治愈出院87例，累计死亡病例2例。现有2例在定点医院进行隔离治疗，其中兰州市1例、定西市1例。甘肃本地目前无疑似病例。目前，甘肃本地累计追 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxfEagYQ0" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479249744047112:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479249744047112&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609493810&amp;ssig=9MOCF94vxW" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479247567801905" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IxfAEwJDb?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-05 22:41" date="1583419302000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479247567801905:fromprofile"> 2020-3-5 22:41</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        加油！平安！//<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/SCIband%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6%E7%B4%A2%E5%BC%95%E4%B9%90%E9%98%9F?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=SCIband科学索引乐队">@SCIband科学索引乐队</a>: 我的同门师弟刘凯，本科毕业于四川大学华西临床医学院的呼吸治疗系，现就职于复旦大学附属中山医院，目前正在支援武汉！加油，等你平安归来！！一起约火锅呀！                                            </div>
                                                                        <div class="WB_feed_expand">
                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">
                                                                            <div class="WB_info">
                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4479216797771991" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="央视新闻" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@央视新闻</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E4%B8%BA%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E5%81%9C%E4%B8%8B%E6%AC%A3%E8%B5%8F%E6%97%A5%E8%90%BD%23&amp;from=default">#医生为病人停下欣赏日落#</a>【落日余晖下的这个瞬间，刻骨铭心<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">转发！存下！】武大人民医院东院，上海复旦大学附属中山医院援鄂医疗队队员刘凯医生在护送病人做CT途中，停下来，让已经住院近一个月的87岁老先生欣赏了一次久违的日落……落日余晖下的两个身影，好暖<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">（总台央视记者王殿甲） ​​​​                                                            </div>

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->
                                                                                        <a target="_blank" suda-uatrack="key=click comments&amp;value=click:home:1" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxfAEwJDb?filter=hot&amp;root_comment_id=0" class="WB_cardmore S_txt1 S_line1 clearfix"><span class="more_txt">查看更多<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_right S_ficon">a</i></span></a>
                                                  </div>  
            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>
    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！记者观察：美国加州宣布进入紧急状态】当地时间3月4日，美国加利福尼亚州宣布进入紧急状态。目前，加州累计确诊53例新冠肺炎病例，1例死亡。当地华人社区现在情况如何？看直播↓↓关注！（央视记者刘骁骞） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4479245084339467:1034-video:1034%3A4479263873892384:page_100206_home:2656274875:4479245084339467:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A678gxrL" alt="http://t.cn/A678gxrL" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%99%A4%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E5%B7%B2%E8%B6%8515000%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#除中国全球新冠肺炎已超15000例#</a> 转起关注！战疫！】 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【转起分享！震撼短片！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%B5%E5%BD%B1%E5%BC%8F%E7%A7%91%E6%99%AE%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E5%85%A5%E4%BE%B5%E4%BA%BA%E4%BD%93%23&amp;from=default">#电影式科普病毒如何入侵人体#</a>】这短视频只为提醒你，要更加爱惜自己！再次提醒：戴好口罩！别给病毒可乘之机！（B站UP主 三个老爸实验室） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4479225614545369:1034-video:1034%3A4479225000820791:page_100206_home:2656274875:4479225614545369:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6789IJR" alt="http://t.cn/A6789IJR" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3276722231" usercard="id=3276722231">儿科陈医生</a><a title="微博铁粉" target="_blank" href="https://kefu.weibo.com/faqdetail?id=20848"><span class="icon_icon"><i class="W_icon_bf icon_bigfans"></i></span></a>：新冠病毒粘在人的口、鼻、眼粘膜上，它表面的突起就是S蛋白，S蛋白一个小小的受体结合结构域（RBD），就是S蛋白与ACE2相联结的地方。它会结合人体ACE2（血管紧张素转化酶2）。ACE2最大的缺点是容易被病毒利用，就像房间的门把手，病毒找到它，就顺利打开大门，在人体繁殖。戴口罩可防病毒进入呼吸道。        </div>

                        <div class="between_line S_bg1" node-type="comment_line"></div>
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479216797771991" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IxeN1wBQH?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-05 20:39" date="1583411967000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479216797771991:fromprofile"> 2020-3-5 20:39</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E4%B8%BA%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E5%81%9C%E4%B8%8B%E6%AC%A3%E8%B5%8F%E6%97%A5%E8%90%BD%23&amp;from=default">#医生为病人停下欣赏日落#</a>【落日余晖下的这个瞬间，刻骨铭心<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">转发！存下！】武大人民医院东院，上海复旦大学附属中山医院援鄂医疗队队员刘凯医生在护送病人做CT途中，停下来，让已经住院近一个月的87岁老先生欣赏了一次久违的日落……落日余晖下的两个身影，好暖<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">（总台央视记者王殿甲） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen" usercard="id=2656274875">央视新闻</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E4%B8%BA%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E5%81%9C%E4%B8%8B%E6%AC%A3%E8%B5%8F%E6%97%A5%E8%90%BD%23&amp;from=default">#医生为病人停下欣赏日落#</a>【这位老人曾经心情低落，如今常常唱歌】医疗队队员介绍，老人曾心情低落，还没有换洗衣服，家人住得很远。医疗队担负起他的生活物资供应，包括糕点、水果，连内衣都是男队员捐的。在医疗队细心诊疗照料下，老人如今开始康复，常常唱歌。转起祝福！        </div>

        <!-- 对评论的操作 -->
        <div class="WB_func clearfix">
            <div class="WB_handle W_fr">
                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->
                                        <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Ixe9NnrAi&amp;type=2&amp;url=&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=6', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 投诉 -->
                    <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=6147252794&amp;screen_name=一束阳光照射在树叶上" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                    <!-- 查看对话 -->
                                        <!-- 查看对话 -->
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6147252794&amp;cid=4479192475587582&amp;nick=一束阳光照射在树叶上&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%97%A5%E8%AE%B0%23&amp;from=default">#武汉日记#</a>【这些护士照顾着<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E8%80%81%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A9%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎老小孩患者#</a> 转起！说声辛苦了！】武汉卓尔长江应急医院，收治了60岁以上老年患者62人，占患者总数43%，其中有9位老年患者有偏瘫、阿尔兹海默症等症状生活无法自理，这些患者的护理，全靠这些护士↓↓↓请看完这段视频，你会了解他们的艰辛。（总台央视记者张竣）&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxdmcuFRP" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479161727310781:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479161727310781&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->
                                        <!-- 查看对话 -->
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=3442713164&amp;cid=4479161903298908&amp;nick=粉嫩奶盖吖&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E7%BE%8E%E4%B8%BB%E6%8C%81%E4%BA%BA%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E9%81%93%E6%AD%89%E8%AE%BA%23&amp;from=default">#外交部回应美主持人中国道歉论#</a>】近期，美国福克斯新闻台主持人在播出节目时称，中国人应该就新冠肺炎疫情“正式道歉”。对此，外交部发言人赵立坚今天表示，个别主持人的言论荒谬可笑，充分暴露出他对中国的傲慢、偏见和无知。赵立坚强调疫病是人类的公敌，各国患病的人都是受害者。目前病毒源自何 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ixd8OsEaY" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479153426827624:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479153426827624&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479151442905865" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ixd5CcbWN?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-05 16:19" date="1583396385000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479151442905865:fromprofile"> 2020-3-5 16:19</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【快讯！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A6088%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#韩国新冠肺炎累计确诊6088例#</a>】韩国中央防疫对策本部通报，截至当地时间5日下午16时，韩国新增新冠肺炎确诊病例322例，累计确诊病例已升至6088例。（总台记者李大杰） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E7%9A%84%E5%B0%8F%E5%BF%83%E6%84%BF%23&amp;from=default">#医护人员的小心愿#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E7%9A%84%E6%84%BF%E6%9C%9B%E6%98%AF%E5%BC%A0%E4%BF%A1%E5%93%B2%E7%9A%84%E7%AD%BE%E5%90%8D%23&amp;from=default">#武汉护士的愿望是张信哲的签名#</a>】一位护士说：“希望等疫情结束了，能够得到一张张信哲的签名，喜欢他好多年了～”还有护士说：“等疫情结束后，最想吃到正宗的热干面。”看完这段采访，你会发现，战疫一线的他们，都是平凡生活中的普通人，此刻，在负重前行！致敬！祝福！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"> ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxcRwm6Uh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479142705269769:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479142705269769&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%B1%E5%90%8C%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%23&amp;from=default">#共同战疫#</a>【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E4%B8%BE%E8%A1%8C%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制举行新闻发布会#</a>】今天下午，国务院联防联控机制在北京召开新闻发布会，介绍不失时机抓好春季农业生产工作情况，并答记者问。关注！（总台央视记者杨弘杨） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4479131536774218:1034-video:1034%3A4479148131811333:page_100206_home:2656274875:4479131536774218:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67HQgx6" alt="http://t.cn/A67HQgx6" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=5546732793&amp;screen_name=若说云烟也非过眼2022" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AF%BB%E6%89%BE%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E5%B9%B3%E6%B0%91%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%23&amp;from=default">#寻找抗疫平民英雄#</a>【倒在战疫一线的村支书：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%AE%A9%E6%88%91%E4%BC%91%E6%81%AF%E6%88%91%E5%BF%83%E9%87%8C%E4%B8%8D%E8%B8%8F%E5%AE%9E%23&amp;from=default">#让我休息我心里不踏实#</a>】2月24日，辽宁丹东市宽甸满族自治县太平哨镇泡子沿村党支部书记王秀君突发心梗去世。他曾忍着胃痛挂着点滴办公，却不忘为站岗的同事张罗热乎饭。他笑着说：“回家休息我心里不踏实，挺挺就过去了。”这一挺，就是32天，直到生命的 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxbQX9t7G" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479103912256904:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479103912256904&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6885267880&amp;cid=4479104164612497&amp;nick=顾名思义Ting&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E7%9A%84%E5%90%8C%E4%B9%A1%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%23&amp;from=default">#我的同乡英雄#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B9%E8%88%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E6%89%AD%E8%B5%B7%E4%B8%9C%E5%8C%97%E7%A7%A7%E6%AD%8C%23&amp;from=default">#方舱医院扭起东北秧歌#</a> 转！分享现场视频~】近日，武汉沌口方舱医院，为缓解患者紧张压抑的心情，增强抵抗力，来自黑龙江省的医疗队员和患者们一起扭起了东北大秧歌。视频告诉你，为了治愈患者，医护人员想尽办法，“一二三四，走着~扭起来~”<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">（总台央视记者杨洋）&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ixbu57P25" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479089731864469:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479089731864469&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Ixbp357E8&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479086611221036" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ixbp357E8?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-05 12:02" date="1583380928000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479086611221036:fromprofile"> 2020-3-5 12:02</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E5%85%AC%E5%BC%80%E8%AF%BE%23&amp;from=default">#战疫公开课#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%B0%8F%E5%BE%AE%E4%BC%81%E4%B8%9A%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#中小微企业如何应对疫情#</a>】疫情对经济社会发展产生很大影响，交通、旅游、住宿餐饮、线下教育培训等行业都受到了冲击。企业应如何化危机为转机，降低成本，提升自身免疫力？企业管理专家、北京大学国家发展研究院教授陈春花，在线答疑！（总台央视记者庄胜春）<br> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4479086611221036:1034-video:1034%3A4479102707761194:page_100206_home:2656274875:4479086611221036:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67TeJb6" alt="http://t.cn/A67TeJb6" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4479077572840410" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IxbatbUV4?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-05 11:26" date="1583378772000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479077572840410:fromprofile"> 2020-3-5 11:26</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！华南海鲜批发市场大规模消杀】3月3日开始，武汉华南海鲜批发市场启动大规模消杀作业，今天仍在持续进行。消杀完成后，商铺内的囤积货物将予以清理。总台央视记者探访消杀现场，关注！（总台央视记者倪晶依 孙丽鹏） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4479077572840410:1034-video:1034%3A4479081496903723:page_100206_home:2656274875:4479077572840410:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67TRLMM" alt="http://t.cn/A67TRLMM" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479072569001475" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ixb2oBLH5?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-05 11:06" date="1583377580000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479072569001475:fromprofile"> 2020-3-5 11:06</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B7%B4%E5%9F%BA%E6%96%AF%E5%9D%A6%E6%8B%BF%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E5%BA%93%E5%AD%98%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E7%BB%99%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#巴基斯坦拿全国医院库存口罩给中国#</a>】截至3月2日，共有62个国家和7个国际组织向中国捐赠了口罩、防护服等中国急需的疫情防控物资。缅甸政府向我们提供大米，斯里兰卡向我们提供红茶，蒙古国向我们捐赠3万只羊，巴基斯坦拿出全国医院库存的口罩提供给我们。外交部副部长马朝旭表示，这些捐助应该说是 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ixb2oBLH5" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479072569001475:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479072569001475&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=3579518272&amp;screen_name=没有名字可好A" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%8E%A5%E5%9B%9E1300%E4%BD%99%E6%BB%9E%E7%95%99%E6%B5%B7%E5%A4%96%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%85%AC%E6%B0%91%23&amp;from=default">#中国接回1300余滞留海外的中国公民#</a>】外交部副部长马朝旭介绍，面对突如其来的疫情，中国政府坚决维护海外中国公民的安全和正当权益。驻外使领馆积极主动联系回国无门的湖北籍、武汉籍的同胞，我们从世界各地协助接回1300余名滞留海外的中国公民。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4479063789788234:1042163-video:1042163%3A4479064174690308:page_100206_home:2656274875:4479063789788234:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67TaOUR" alt="http://t.cn/A67TaOUR" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E5%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#湖北以外新增5例新冠肺炎#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E9%99%A4%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E3%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#湖北除武汉新增3例新冠肺炎#</a>】3月4日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例139例，新增死亡病例31例（湖北31例），新增疑似病例143例。其中湖北新增确诊病例134例（武汉131例）。除湖北以外，新增病例5例。 ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E8%B6%855%E4%B8%87%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市累计治愈出院超5万人#</a>】据国家卫健委数据统计，截至3月4日24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告累计治愈出院病例52045例，湖北省累计治愈出院病例40479例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <li><span class="line S_line1">

                            </ul>

                                               <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%8D%87%E8%87%B33858%E4%BE%8B%23&from=default\">#意大利确诊病例升至3858例#<\/a>】当地时间3月5日18时，意大利例行疫情新闻发布会公布，该国目前累计新冠肺炎确诊病例达3858例。目前意大利20个大区已全部出现新冠肺炎确诊病例。（总台记者 href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E4%B8%BA%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E5%81%9C%E4%B8%8B%E6%AC%A3%E8%B5%8F%E6%97%A5%E8%90%BD%23&from=default\">#医生为病人停下欣赏日落#<\/a>【这位老人曾经心情低落，如今常常唱歌】医疗队队员介绍，老人曾心情低落，还没有换洗衣服，家人住得很远。医疗队担负起他的生活物资供应，包括糕点、水果，连内衣都是男队员捐的。在医疗队细心诊疗照料下，老人如今开始康复，常常唱歌。转起祝福！
